verses.roman:
seita 'gosāñi' tumi--sākṣāt 'īśvara'
more kṛpā kara, muñi--ayogya pāmara

synonyms: seita—that; gosāñi—Personality of Godhead; tumi—You; sākṣāt—directly; īśvara—the Personality of Godhead; more—upon me; kṛpā kara—kindly be merciful; muñi—I; ayogya pāmara—very fallen and unfit.
translation: "Since You are that very same Supreme Personality of Godhead Himself, please be merciful upon me. I am fallen and unfit.
